alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Monroe, southwestern Wayne and southeastern Washtenaw Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Ypsilanti, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Milan, Belleville and Willis around 305 PM EDT. Maybee around 340 PM EDT. Carleton around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Willow, Scofield, Sumpter Township, Oakville and Waltz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
